pkgmetadata.longdescription: # opscidia_elastisearchTools to manage elasticsearch indexes # Installation ## From pip```bashpip install opscidia-elasticsearch```# Python usage```pythonfrom opscidia_elasticsearch import Managermg = Manager(hosts='url-to-es') # Connect to ESmg.create_index(index_name='') # to create indexmg.save_to_index(generator=None) # to save generator```
